name: Teal
description: Teal is a turn based multiplayer strategy game with simultaneous turns; think chess with guns, that have mind bending trajectories. Games are played on a variety of maps, each with a different focus. Adapting your team composition and anticipating the opponent's next move is the key to victory.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD processor with 2.2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 920M or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
